4. **Ecoegg**: Ecoegg has a **Subscribe & Save** program, which offers 10% off recurring orders. They also have a **Loyalty Rewards** program, where you can earn points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts or free products.
5. **Kind Laundry**: Kind Laundry offers a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders. They also have a **Referral Program**, where you can earn 20% off your next order for every friend you refer.
6. **Breeze**: Breeze has a **Subscribe & Save** program, which offers 10% off recurring orders. They also have a **Loyalty Program**, where you can earn points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts or free products.

Before you order, I recommend checking the brand's website or social media for any promotions, discounts, or limited-time offers. You can also sign up for their newsletters or follow them on social media to stay informed about upcoming deals.

Remember, every little bit counts, and supporting eco-friendly brands that offer sustainable practices and rewards for loyalty is a great way to make a positive impact on the environment!
